title: This Week's Top Stories - Mass Firing Over Zoom, KKK Statue Removal & Fox News's Christmas Tree Fire
itunes:title: This Week's Top Stories - Mass Firing Over Zoom, KKK Statue Removal & Fox News's Christmas Tree Fire
description:
A CEO lays off 900 employees via Zoom, a Confederate statue of a KKK leader is removed in Nashville, TN, and Fox News's Christmas Tree catches fire in New York City.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
